entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
